title: Every time i level up cant select champion, cursor disapears
body:
im new to lol and everytime i level up there is an option between 3 champions and everytime i aproach the select button i cant click it

tried reseting client and computer, please help

replies.body:
I am also having the same issue.

EDIT: im on mac so task manager stuff doesnt work

I got a way to fix it all you need to do is 
1) get task manager out when you are at the character selection 
2) then find league in the advanced task manager
3) press the arrow on the left side and end task on the middle league client it will reset the character selection.
@riot this is a terrible issue. We literally cannot play the game, and cannot log out and play on a different account as alt + f4 does not log out. Would like a response on this if possible

Please see my response to OP. It's being looked into.

I must have missed this thread when I went back to answer them all.
The comment i posted might give the people behind the scenes a bit of a clue on a fix so might want to refer them to it. :)

Hi everyone, i found a half-fix for the problem which allows you to select the champion you want and keep playing normally.

~~When you get to the champion select page on level up, hover your mouse over the select button on the champion you want, even though it doesnt light up or allow you to click it.~~ Next, relaunch the game, and whilst it is loading, spam click in the 'select' spot for the champion you want, and although the screen will stay black, you will be able to choose your champion then you can continue normally. I know this isnt a full fix but it works fine.

Cheers
i just click below the select and then hit escape and it passes the reward screen, cant get the rewards but can at least keep playing

Same is happening to me now. Cant get through the prompt and can't select any Champions.

HAALLLP!
Same thing keeps happening to me and I can’t play . Has anyone figured a way to fix ?

@riot I have been having this issue as well. It happened the first time I was asked to choose one of three champions and then when I didn't play for a while I was then able to select a champion. However, It has happened again and I have waited for two weeks and restarted my computer multiple times. It still does not allow me to select a champion. It is rather annoying. Please sort this out ASAP.
Having the same issue, just want to play the game.
Getting this bug to, have hard closed client via task manager, reset computer, still cant select or get through to play games
Follow up - uninstalling and reinstalling client does not fix, still can't play as can't get past champion/reward selection screen.

Yep, having the same problem and there is no way to exit either so you just gotta refresh and reboot client. The first few times it takes you back to the same screen and then eventually it'll throw an exception and you can play the game again. I've missed mages and now supports, lvl 3-4 respectively. It would be dope to fix this for new players as they will surely not enjoy this and may be deterred.

>Thanks for reporting this, we'll need to gather some logs to investigate further. If you'd like to help us dig into this:

>1. Please download and install the [Hextech Repair Tool (HRT)](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/player-support/tools/hextech-repair-tool/latest/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi). (If you've already got the HRT installed, uninstall it and then install this latest version.
2. Once you've opened the HRT, deselect the "Automatically Assign" and "Add Firewall Exceptions" options, we won't be needing those.
3. Click Start.
4. A .zip file will be created on your desktop called LoL Logs. Attach this file in an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

>We will then pass these logs on for investigation.
